artist: Painter: After Anthony van Dyck; Engraver: John Corner; Publisher: Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London; Publisher: Lackington, Allen & Co.

Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

below image in black: Van Dyck pinx't   Corner Inc't / FRANCIS SNYDERS / Published for the Proprietor, acording to the Act of Parliament March 1, 1825. / by Longman, Hurst, Res, Orme & Brown; & Lackington, Allen & Co. / London
title: Portrait of Francis Snyders
